name: MYC_MESG_DRG_QTNS
description: This table contains patient answers to drug use questions submitted in a history questionnaire.

columns.name: MESSAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the message record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The ID of the drug use history question answered by the patient.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient's response to the question about drug use.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_FREQ
columns.description: The patient's response to the drug use frequency question.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_CMT
columns.description: The comment added by the patient when answering the drug use question.

columns.name: DRG_QUESN_FILED_YN
columns.description: The filed status of the drug use question--has the provider filed it to the patient's record.
